Message.Title: Flashback 1984 - Polls had Mondale ahead of Reagan
Message.Msg: these leftist mainstream media push polls are designed to falsely show public support for a candidate in order to trick people into supporting that candidate.

Message.Title: Some support here now
Message.Msg: It looks like the bottom has firmed up around $37.50 if you're looking for a point to buy. If it falls below that from here on out it will be intraday and bought quickly. The price action can be confusing when they fall fast, bounce, and give back some of the bounce, but the moving averages smooth all that out. Again if you are looking to buy this point will look good to you in a few weeks.

Topic.Title: Flashback 1984 - Polls had Mondale ahead of Reagan
